plot outline: Kabadam, the film, the lead pair gets engaged and when they start getting closer to each other, they realize that they are at opposite poles, and all hell breaks loose. There is some intense romance and it is also a whodunit kind of thriller.
title: Kabadam
plot: _Kabadam_ (qv), the film, the lead pair gets engaged and when they start getting closer to each other, they realize that they are at opposite poles, and all hell breaks loose. There is some intense romance and it is also a whodunit kind of thriller.::Manow Shelvaraj
